name: Malleswara Darshan heritage walk.
description: This is our walk in one of the oldest suburbs of the "old Bangalore". Join us on a 'darshan' of the many temples and other religious institutes that dot this area as we narrate to you its origins and about the celebrities/personalities who called it their 'home'. Also on this walk learn more about the Maratha connection to this neighborhood as well as how a philanthropist not only helped renovate the Kadu Malleswara temple but also helped create an entire lake in the days gone by.See how Kadu Malleswara turned into a "Mall-e-swarm" and is fast losing not only it's heritage structures but also its local culture. In between all the bytes of history we take bites from an iconic eatery in the this area.So join us on this walk next and get to know Malleswaram in a completely new light.

location.address: Sampige Road, Malleshwaram, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560003, India

organizer.name: Bengaluru by foot
organizer.description: Heritage, food & architectural walks in Bangalore.

name: Dialogues with Books
description: Dialogues with Books Join us for our book club meetup every third Sunday of the month. Bring along your favorite book, the book you are currently reading, or any book that had an impact on you. Share your experience reading the book with fellow bibliophiles and participate in winding and fun discussions around the joy of reading. Do all this while sipping on coffee/tea or having a hot tasty snack from our cafe! Your Host - Bharat is an avid reader with a penchant for classical literature and philosophy. He also dabbles in writing with a diverse portfolio of works across tech, philosophy, magical realism and fantasy. His reading diet includes a mix of fiction and non-fiction with his favorite novels being The Great Gatsby by F. Scott Fitzgerald, The Movable feast by Hemmingway and Crime and Punishment by Dostoevsky.Note: Rs.100 as cover is part of the ticket price.

location.address: 21, 80 Feet Rd, Nirguna Mandir Layout, 4th Block, Koramangala, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560095, India

organizer.name: Dialogues Cafe Private Limited
organizer.description: Dialogues Cafe is a warm, homely space in Koramangala where natural light meets community vibes. Enjoy freshly made, minimalist cuisine while engaging in open mics, book clubs, and more. Whether you’re here to work, create, or connect, Dialogues Cafe is your space to belong.

name: Dialogues Poetry Open Mic
description: Lovers of poetry and prose — this one is for you!Whether you like listening, reading or performing poems or short stories, be ready to be entertained. We are on a journey to create safe spaces for the writers in town — to share their writing with like-minded people and become part of our community. You can hold us accountable for making you have a good time!Join us at Dialogues Cafe,Koramangala from 7:30 PM onwards, on every 3rd Sunday

name: Immersive arm- balance and backbend workshop
description: Join us for an immersive workshop designed to unlock the strength and fluidity within your body as we explore the art of arm balances and the grace of backbends. This session combines playful exploration with focused techniques, guiding you through the mechanics, mindset, and alignment needed to deepen your practice.Meet Sanjana, the founder of Yogakalpa, a yoga studio and global community.A distinguished yoga teacher with Gold medal in National Yoga Championship and Silver medal in State Yoga Championship, Sanjana's expertise shines in advanced asanas empowering yogis to deepen their practice. Now, Sanjana is bringing her expertise to the Studio by Copper + Cloves!Join her for an immersive inversion workshop where you'll learn the art of headstands, forearm stands, and everything in between. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced yogi, this workshop will provide valuable insights, modifications, and preparation strategies to safely and confidently explore the world of inversions.

If you prefer not to be featured, please inform our team.Bringing outside food into the yard area is not permitted.Tickets are non-refundable in case of cancellation or no-show.In the event of rain leading to a complete washout, Courtyard reserves the right to cancel the event. name: Movie Under the Stars | Film: High Fidelity
description: Join us for an open-air screening of High Fidelity (2000), with a three-course dinner by chef Rhea Aaron and popcorn.*Wines and other beverages will be available for purchase at the venue.About the movieRob Gordon, a music-obsessed record store owner, reflects on his failed relationships and attempts to understand what went wrong. Through his top five breakups and a deep dive into his love life, Rob explores his past with his quirky employees, friends, and exes. The film blends humor, romance, and the love for music in a unique way, creating an introspective and relatable experience. It’s a story about self-discovery, nostalgia, and finding closure, all set to an unforgettable soundtrack.This cult classic's nostalgic and heartfelt story pairs perfectly with the relaxed vibe of an outdoor screening. Its mix of humor, romance, and a killer soundtrack will evoke shared memories and discussions among the audience. The movie's witty dialogue and emotional depth make it ideal for a cozy evening under the stars, where viewers can enjoy the music, laugh, and even reflect on their own relationships, making it a memorable and immersive experience.3-Course Dinner Menu by chef Rhea AaronTo be announced.______Terms and ConditionsThe management is not responsible for any injury or damage that may occur during the event.No liability or claims arising from the consumption or intake of any food or drink will be entertained by the management.Parking near the event premises is at the risk of the vehicle owner.Valet service is available at a charge of Rs. 200 per vehicle.Photographs and videos of ticket holders may be uploaded to social media. name: Angel Poi and Flow Workshop with Shraddha
description: Flow and Introduction to Angel PoiA unique exploration of your inner flow through mindful movement and an introduction to the basics of angel poi spinning.In this session, Shraddha will guide you through a combination of stretches to increase flexibility and co-ordination, flow exercises to explore connection and presence through movement followed by learning some techniques of spinning angel poi. This beginner friendly session is the perfect way to tap into your natural rhythm and creative expression.
